item.title: Optical Character Recognition and Text to Speech
item.description: Optical Character Recognition is an approach aiming to recognize characters from images (mainly) in this way, thus making it easier to manipulate the text that has been recognized. Text to Speech refers to speech synthesis or an “artificial production of speech”.

item.title: Quatro Maneiras de Manipular Arquivo CSV em Python
item.description: Com o avanço da adoção da tecnologia para acelerar as pequisas na área cientifica, cada vez mais pessoas estão buscando formas otimizadas de manipular massa de dados (dataset, dataframe). Sendo assim nas próximas linhas irei abordar algumas maneiras de alcançar esse objetivo.

item.title: Building a Mission-Critical Open Source Environment for the Java Platform - Chapter I
item.description: Currently the Java platform is one of the most consolidated in the world, much of this is due to platform’s ability to support other languages such as Kotlin, Groovy and Scala, etc. Thousands of web and mobile applications are developed using the platform as a base. The Java platform has changed a lot in recent years and probably will keep evolving.

item.title: Building a Mission-Critical Open Source Environment for the Java Platform - Chapter II
item.description: In Chapter I, we set up the high availability of the Web layer. In this chapter we will install WildFly and configure the Master/Subordinate topology.

item.title: Building a Mission-Critical Open Source Environment for the Java Platform - Chapter III
item.description:
Below are the chapters I and II:

  • Building a Mission-Critical Open Source Environment for the Java Platform - Chapter I
  • Building a Mission-Critical Open Source Environment for the Java Platform - Chapter II

item.description:

  • Building a Mission-Critical Open Source Environment for the Java Platform - Chapter II
